    • writeToBinaryFile

      public static void writeToBinaryFile(String fileName, Object obj) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Writes the given object to a file with the given file name
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file
      obj - Object that will be saved to a file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - exception that is thrown when program can't find a file
      IOException - exception that is thrown when IO exception accrued

      Read Object from a file with given file name
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file
      Returns:
      obj Object that is in the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - exception that is thrown when program can't find a file
      IOException - exception that is thrown when IO exception accrued
      ClassNotFoundException - exception that is thrown when class is not found

      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file
      obj - object that will be saved to a file
      Throws:
